summary.para: Gets a subformat in the formatted timed-text object.

param.name: index
param.para: The index of the subformat in the formatted timed-text object.

param.name: firstChar
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives the first character of the subformat.

param.name: charLength
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives the length, in characters, of the subformat.

param.name: style
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the interface for the subformat's timed-text style. This parameter can be NULL.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the number of subformats in the formatted timed-text object.
Gets the text in the formatted timed-text object.

param.name: text
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives the null-terminated wide-character string that contains the text.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Represents a block of formatted timed-text.
